website_summaries.verdict: A must-have crew sock for shoulder season, providing a comfortable fit and just enough warmth for outdoor sports.
pros: All-synthetic material provides a secure fit, moisture wicking, and lightweight warmth
Reinforced heels don’t wear out even after heavy use
Comfortable to wear for sports and everyday activities
cons: Cannot be washed in hot water, and some think the cuffs are too low

customer_reviews.title: Low quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, but very cheap fabric. After one use and wash they started to fray. I will update this after a few months to see how they hold up, but it is not looking good. So far they don’t stink, but they collect hair like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Teal

customer_reviews.title: scratchy-maybe not really Nike Brand?
customer_reviews.text: My son-who is not picky-thinks these socks are scratchy and of poor quality. Not what I would expect from Nike--maybe they are a knock-off???
customer_reviews.author: benanna

customer_reviews.title: Not black, they are faded....
customer_reviews.text: Umm so this are not black socks... they are actually faded. It hard to see in the picture because of lightning etc... but I assure you these are not black. I put them side by side with my old socks and you can definitely tell a difference. If you flip the pic in the right direction the ones on the left are the real Nike socks I got from an actual store vs (I don’t want to say this...) but these fake looking Nike’s I just bought from here.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Schubert

customer_reviews.title: They are not real
customer_reviews.text: The product was very disappointing. The logo was backwards and the white socks were so sheer you can see your skin color. The sock feel like something you would buy at the dollar store. I do not recommend these are fakes
customer_reviews.author: lina zahlan

customer_reviews.title: Great & cute! 💖 $12-14
customer_reviews.text: What’s with all the nasty reviews? These socks are thick and great! I’m a woman. I wear a size 8.5 in women’s & 6 in men’s so I got a Medium (: I got them in all the colors. White, Black, & Gray (: I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Fake or defective
customer_reviews.text: These are either seriously defective or fakes. Nike logo is reversed, no toe stitching as in real Nike socks, feels like a different material than real Nike socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My Teen needed white socks for LAX, and these fit the bill. Her team tie dyed them and wears them frequently. Exactly what we expected for a Nike sock!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Pitonyak

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I imagine these are good socks for most people, but the elastic is tight. Buyer beware if you have any issues at all with circulation or are prone to getting marks on your legs from socks. I'd never had this problem before I bought these socks. For me this was a bad purchase. Never will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered these socks. They are very comfortable and did not shrink! That is a huge pet pieve of mine.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: I like these socks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks to tick off the Republican nutcases that were boycotting NIKE over the Betsy Ross Flag Shoes. I really like these socks and ordered another set. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juya

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Quality, Likely Fakes (Beware)
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Nike socks for years. They're some of the most durable, comfortable cotton socks you can get for decent money. These are nothing like previous Nike I've bought. The fabric is super thin. They're rough and uncomfortable. And the fit is loose (despite getting my usual size). Given such poor quality, I suspect they're fakes even though I bought them (ships/sold) from Amazon.com. I returned this garbage and bought the same Nike socks from my local sports store which were of the quality I would expect. I highly suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with the quality of these socks. I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves these black Nike socks. These arrived and I noticed a discrepancy in length. They’re dramatically shorter than ones purchased before. After one laundry cycle they started coming apart. Terrible product! Disappointed in Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!  Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not often I post a bad review. Usually I will only take the time to write something I get excited about. However, with this product, I couldn’t resist. These socks are terrible. They don’t stay up, stretch out, are not comfortable, not absorbent, and in fact have already ripped. I have socks that I’ve owned for over 10 years. These didn’t last 2 months. Almost all my sportswear is Nike, and never have I seen such terrible quality. Must be a knock off. SAVE YOUR MONEY or spend a little more to get something better!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: tight on the ankles
customer_reviews.text: i bought a pair of the smaller size,fit okay. pretty tight, and decided to try the larger size, and not really much difference.very tight on my ankles -. the small size actually fit the length of my foot better but was tighter around the arch of my foot,the large size were only slightly longer and with the same,if not tighter ankle elastic
customer_reviews.author: nc

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I feel duped - there's a reason these are cheaper than all of the other Nike socks - they are not manufactured by Nike and are cheaply made - do not buy these socks - Nike socks are excellent and these are beyond cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Mildenberger

customer_reviews.title: Tops are tight
customer_reviews.text: I wear work boots and sneakers everyday and my socks get holes in the heels very quickly--within a few months. We tried these socks due to the brand name, thinking they would be quality. The tops are so tight that I had to cut off the top 1 inch and now of course they fray. A family joke is that I have 'bird legs' so my calves are very thin and they were still too tight. Won't buy these again and don't recommend them for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tthomp3

customer_reviews.title: Love these but sizing seems off...
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these socks from Nike for years and I have been buying the same medium size. However, these seem to be very small compared to what I have purchased in the past. I wear size 8.5/9 mens shoes and I can barely put these one. My old pairs were a tad large upon purchase so I am thinking that perhaps Nike has made these smaller? I would recommend purchasing one size larger than you normally buy.
customer_reviews.author: John Ash

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price =  cheap product
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I guess. These things fell apart after the first use. My daughter wore them as part of her cheer uniform, which was literally just her sitting in bleachers wearing them while cheering for the boys basketball team. She didn't even stunt in them. Then entire six pair were trashed within three weeks. They unravel in the washer, and fade tremendously after just the first wash ON COLD. They definitely aren't worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Walser

customer_reviews.title: Great quality socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit nicely and will differently buy then again! Bought these socks when I went to college! Could not find them in the stores! Order them again when I needed them again! Delivery the next day with Prime shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M Manton

customer_reviews.title: A little thin but ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sock sizing was good. However, they seem a little thin for our liking. Thinking this may impact their durability compared to previous ones we’ve purchased. However, I bought some similar at the Nike store and they are about the same, so maybe the overall quality of the sock, in general, is not as good as when I last purchased a couple years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes them. Good quality socks. When the need comes again I’ll order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and scratchy
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for Nike socks, try the "performance cushion" line instead of these. These socks have absolutely terrible fabric that is very thin and scratchy feeling. Stay away from these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Secker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd buy brand name socks this time so they'd last longer, but these did not. They faded noticeably after one wash. Even though I'm gentle with my things, one sock got a hole in it when I pulled it on. The elastic at the top is too tight. My calves are slim, but these left big indentations. I guess the good news is that they stayed up! Also didn't turn my feet black as generic socks did. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: OR Park

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the money. Thanks to Prime!
customer_reviews.text: I like that even though I don’t remember buying these they came to me. And are in my orders. For the money I paid for them they were worth it. I have to add. They are tall socks yet do not go to the knee which I like a lot. These are a size medium and I wear a size 7 in woman’s. They fit perfectly. So glad I have them. Very comfortable. And shipped right to the house!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, ok dye
customer_reviews.text: Socks are very comfortable and the arch elastic really helps them stay put. The only downside is that the black color fades after several washes (even in cold water). They still work great, but have an old sock look to them. How important that is is up to you.
customer_reviews.author: Caliente Soul

customer_reviews.title: Great bargin
customer_reviews.text: Only reason it is not 5 stars, is because it was delivered to someone else and they opened the package then dropped off at my house a day later.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wear out really fast.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the least durable socks I've ever owned. I don't tend to wear out socks very easily and after a couple weeks each pair is starting to loose fabric in the heel. Not to mention each sock constantly has a ball of fuzz inside... It just continues to deteriorate from the inside out. If you want socks that last, get the Nike performance or dri-fit socks. I've had those last for years and have yet to find a hole in them. These aren't going to make me not buy Nike socks again, just not the Everyday brand. These ones kind of suck.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Elms

customer_reviews.title: Thin and passable
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and cheap. I expected a little more cushion, given that the name of the product has the word cushion in it. I work on my feet most of the day so I’d like something to keep my feet warm and comfortable. But these are just thin and I don’t see them lasting much longer than a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for outfits!
customer_reviews.text: This are nice socks and really stylish. You can wear them with anything and they are really comfortable, but if you have hairy legs like me and you wear them for the whole day, when is time to take them off they will leave you with a little pain since they were squishing your hairs all day.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: THE QUALITY OF THESE SOCKS IS ABYSMAL. DO NOT purchase this product. I have already thrown 3 of the 6 pair that I purchased less than 6 MONTHS AGO that already had worn holes in the heel. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY PLEASE!!
customer_reviews.author: Gatorman

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these socks. She walks outside without shoes (against my advice) and no holes yet!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bauso Dovidio

customer_reviews.title: Stiff but they’re Nike.
customer_reviews.text: Besides being a white sock with a Nike sign, they really aren’t that.. comfortable! BUT they are socks and socks do what socks do. 🥴
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Fit and wore as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband. My son promptly took the package and put them on. So they fit the 12-39 year old size 8-12 male demographic. They liked the way it “hugged” their feet. I likes that they were grey and showed less dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Artmom27

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 13 year old son. He was unable to even get them past mid-foot. They are sized as men's, but fit as if they were for a very small boy. As they were to conform to his uniform, I gave them to his 6 year old cousin who was able to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper version of what is at Cost-Co for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying the same Nike socks I buy at Cost-Co however these are thinner and a little smaller even though they are listed as the same size. These are diffidently a lower quality than the Nike socks I normally buy at Cost-Co.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK ASHER

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: These are not real. The package looks recycled. Honestly this looks bad on amazon to me. They look used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Nike Socks
customer_reviews.text: Cheap knock offs socks. Thin and rip easy without any effort. My boyfriend bought these and their all torn at the heel in the same spot. Thought we were getting a good deal, turns off there just knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sports
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my boys, amazon beats the factory prices and they love the brand. They wash up very well, of course they are white, so if you are buying these buy bleach, at least with kids.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: The band for your ankle on this is hella tight. I start to lose circulation and i am constantly adjusting so that i don't lose feeling in my feet. I wear a woman's size 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Kinda tight
customer_reviews.text: I like these but I could see how they might be too tight for some. These are pretty tight around the ankle and lower calf for me, and I’m 5’3 and 115 pounds. I do have muscular calves though.
customer_reviews.author: AB.

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for picky son. He really does like them and they seem to be good quality socks. Was worried they would be thin or look cheap but they are pretty decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip love

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves them
customer_reviews.text: These seem to run high price because of the brand name but my son loves them. This is the 3rd set we have bought. He does go through them so I recommend a few sets of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 4

customer_reviews.title: Just maybe don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t bad but you can tell they’re not true Nike’s. The quality just isn’t there. If you’re on a budget though they’re not terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Cadie Coderre

customer_reviews.title: Standard and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: White socks. Nothing more, nothing less. They go up to the perfect spot on my shins. Not too high, not too low. Comfortable and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great sport sock
customer_reviews.text: These are great athletic socks but always sold out in stores. My grandkids use these while playOmg lacrosse and soccer. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: KnowledgeIsPower

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through white socks like nobody's business. He switches back and forth between Nike and Adidas tennis shoes and I have to constantly buy new socks to match!
customer_reviews.author: dezsantos

customer_reviews.title: Thin and short
customer_reviews.text: These are not the nice, thick, Nike socks like I was expecting. Shorter and a lot thinner than my previous Nike socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is thin. And the elastic is so tight it leaves marks and hurts. Not for daily wear, workouts only.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel T. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Nike socks hold up great
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Nike. My boys are so rough on socks. Nike holds up great. I Will continue to buy these. Great price
customer_reviews.author: NatalieP

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these socks elsewhere. They are the only ones my grandson will wear. I decided to look here on Amazon and found them in a package rather than single pairs and the price was a lot better also.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Burek

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great! I bought a size medium, I wear a size 10 shoe and I like my socks to fit more snug. If I wore any size bigger I would have bought a size large. I just hate it when socks are baggy on the ankle and these are perfect! I bought them to wear with my AF1's. They are perfect! They also have great padding on the heel and ball of the foot. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maitlin Ullom

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we thought we were getting so we are so happy. They are soft and comfortable and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Carleene Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Than at Nike Store
customer_reviews.text: These are my boyfriends favorite socks and they were cheaper on here than at the nike store, major score!
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Product vary from personal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says it's comfortable to wear on her feet, but after washing it for several times, the elasticity has obviously decreased
customer_reviews.author: vzzWendy

customer_reviews.title: One of the socks has a hole in it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are not picky buyers at all, but this socks package we bought for our son is a true disappointment. It came seemingly ok, until my son open it up when he went back to his school. There is one inside that has a hole in it!!!. My son has taken them back to his school before opening it up, so it is not practical for him to take a Uber to drop it at a UPS store for a return, so this purchase instantly become 20% more expensive for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: One sock completely fell apart at first wash. They are thin and not weighted with the expected Nike quality,
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1979

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little suspicious about these socks but when I got them I loved them, they fit true to size and they're very comfortable, have lasted me a 2 volleyball seasons, and still going, these were also cheap I thought for the amount of socks and quality
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrive on time and as expected. Retail packaging of Nike sox at a descent price.
customer_reviews.author: RZ80

customer_reviews.title: Thin and no Cushion
customer_reviews.text: The socks have virtually no cushion. They are so thin, you can see your skin through them. Also, I didn't pick up on the fact that they are so high on the calf.
customer_reviews.author: Hedgewick

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these.
customer_reviews.text: These are my husbands favorite socks. We were so thankful to find them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: vpiltk

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased all around with socks. Great fit and comfort. Wash well and no shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Monique K Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We buy a couple packs of socks a year to replace older worn out socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter and a great price I have so much trouble finding them in the store
customer_reviews.author: Michele C Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bough for grandson for Christmas. He was very happy with them and said they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Eddleman

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these for her last season of volleyball. They were up to the test.
customer_reviews.author: shiparino

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and daughter for basketball. They wash well and fit great
customer_reviews.author: Ajjer36

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sport sock
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Cheerleader. She loves them, very comfortable, stays clean and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Basic comfy socks! Good quality tho I wouldn’t definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My son just a absolutely loves these socks. Been buying them for about 2 yrs now.
customer_reviews.author: Chikis

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them. Great fit. Good quality. Happy I ordered them and will again
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They are just Nike socks. Nothing special. I wish they had more Arch support.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Little tight at the top but my daughter says they'll stretch out. They fit perfectly, she's a shoe size 7.5. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amzngrl

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: These didn't last long. They are thin, wore out quickly. Comfortable sock but wears out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Itchy, Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are not of the same quality as the other socks I ordered. These are supposed to be Nike and they are thin, itchy, cheap. I purchased these prior and these are not the same. Maybe an imitation.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: This socks are such a great price for nike. They are so comfy but over time they do become a lighter black not as black as when first purchased. I use these socks for my birks, my air forces, crocs, perfect for dancing espically contemporary class, and even for my ugg boots.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got it for boyfriend for vacation its great..
customer_reviews.author: ISABEL MOC

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: These are for my child who's in school. They've been durable and the price is well with it!
customer_reviews.author: N`kole

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: The product runs small, and leaves marks on my calves because they are too tight
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Faded after one wash
customer_reviews.text: Smells really strong of incense. Thin material, one wash and they faded but still smell.
customer_reviews.author: nubian princess

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Already falling apart without washing them. The photo in the review is from the first day I wore them. Don’t buy. Go get some under armour or some other brand. I haven’t bought socks from Nike in 15 years, big mistake to go back. Awful product. They are the thickness of dress socks...
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Fine socks
customer_reviews.text: They're not as flexible as say Nike Dry Fits. Good sock and fit for a 12-13 size men's shoe with Large.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Nike good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Always a good buy for the money. Wash and wear well. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Michele Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. The socks are small for the size I chose and really thin.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle 313

customer_reviews.title: Top quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to play volleyball. The fit is great however they run a bit big but did shrink some after washing. The length comes mid calf on these. Very comfortable and thick soled for durability. These will be our go to socks for sure!
customer_reviews.author: susanna mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 7th and 9th grader loves these socks. And they were a little cheaper. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not super durable, come up a bit too high.
customer_reviews.text: Found them not to be extremely durable and the Swoosh fades pretty quickly. 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: With constant use they do not hold up very well as compared to more off brand socks
customer_reviews.text: While these socks look great because they're Nike, the durability is horrible. After around 3 weeks of cycling between pairs of these they started to fall apart, just from typical day things like walking. Not saying all Nike socks are bad, but these socks did not hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Funk

customer_reviews.title: Kid socks
customer_reviews.text: They we're little kid socks. Gave them to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Native

customer_reviews.title: Great cheer socks
customer_reviews.text: Cheerleading socks- daughter shared with her friends that couldn’t find these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're Nike socks....
customer_reviews.text: They're socks....not much else to say. Waiting to see if they hold up well with normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Eyes

customer_reviews.title: These run small
customer_reviews.text: Order bigger than you need. These are a little tight. Had to return them because they were too small for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Gdss714

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these twice already. Will keep buying them. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristi W.

customer_reviews.title: Croc and Birk  socks!
customer_reviews.text: Goes awesome with my Birkenstock’s or my crocs will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: bo abney

customer_reviews.title: n/a
customer_reviews.text: Received these socks they kind a look like knock offs and to top if off they look a little discolored. Not a happy camper abut that
customer_reviews.author: RICKY

customer_reviews.title: Best sock.
customer_reviews.text: Never knew sock quality was so important to foot comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Flores

customer_reviews.title: Rip easily
customer_reviews.text: They're nice socks. But, they are not flexible and they easily rip. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Tight on Top
customer_reviews.text: Socks are too tight at the top and not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AndiUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and the recipient loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, washes well and very comfortable. Both my son and husband wear black socks and the swish logo helps me separate their socks.
customer_reviews.author: HoenJessica Helmbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month since we bought these socks and they are already getting holes in them like the other reviews mentioned. I didn't read the reviews before I purchased the socks. Bad job Nike, very cheap product! They should not be selling these on Amazon. Amazon - disappointing that you would sell a product that is getting such poor reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

product_meta.title: Nike Everyday Cushion Crew Socks
product_meta.description: Power through your workout with the Nike Everyday Cushion Crew Socks (6 Pair). The terry sole athletic socks give you extra comfort for footdrills and lifts while high-friction yarns in the footbed reduce slippage.
feature_bullets: SWEAT-WICKING SOCKS: Sweat-wicking fabric pulls perspiration away from the skin to help keep your feet stay dry and comfortable.
REDUCED SLIPPAGE: The high-friction yarn in the footbed of these Nike athletic socks helps reduce slippage so you can power through your workouts.
CREW SOCKS: Nike crew socks have a crew silhouette providing a comfortable fit around the calf that won't slip during workouts.
PRODUCT DETAILS: Machine wash, imported, fabric: 67% cotton/30% polyester/2% spandex/1% nylon (material percentages may vary, check label for actual content)
TERRY SOLE: Nike socks feature a terry sole providing extra comfort and impact absorption for footdrills and lifts; the ideal athletic sock for all your training.
